scripts.template: cd games/template && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.jonas: cd games/jonas && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.mapgame: cd games/mapGame && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.build-all: npm run build-jonas && npm run build-template && npm run build-mapgame
scripts.build-template: cd games/template && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/template --public-url /template/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-jonas: cd games/jonas && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/jonas --public-url /jonas/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-mapgame: cd games/mapGame && npm i && parcel build ./index.html -d ../../dist/mapgame --public-url /mapgame/ && cd ../..
